name: <vec::Vec<T> as core::convert::From<&[T; N]>>::from

core::array::<impl [T; N]>::as_slice.doc: Returns a slice containing the entire array. Equivalent to `&s[..]`.

core::convert::From::from.doc: Converts to this type from the input type.

doc:
Allocates a `Vec<T>` and fills it by cloning `s`'s items.

 # Examples

 ```
 assert_eq!(Vec::from(&[1, 2, 3]), vec![1, 2, 3]);
 ```
